title: Ranked queue cut off.
body:
I was wondering if we will be soon having a full 24/7 cycle of ranked available any time soon, or at least set days with no queue cut offs. 
:(

replies.body: For the OCE servers, ranked queue is turned off at 4am and turned back on at 8am, due to our apparent lack in population. The queue cut off will not interrupt any games in progress, so you shouldn't really have to worry about it.
